p: HEV IgA was undetectable in all HEV RNA+/HEV IgM− patients. In HEV RNA−/HEV IgM+ patients, most individuals also had detectable HEV IgA antibodies, as shown in Table 4 in detail. Overall, these data indicate that HEV IgA testing is not a more sensitive marker than HEV IgM for the diagnosis of HEV infection.
